item.title: Bose's Bluetooth speakers and headphones simplify the process of making connections
item.description:
Bose has expanded its SoundLink mobile audio lineup with two new products: the SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker, their most budget-friendly SoundLink speaker yet, and the SoundLink Bluetooth on-ear headphones, Bose’s first foray into on-ear Bluetooth headphones. The SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker features a brand new design. Weighing in at 1.25 pounds (567g), it measures 5 inches wide, 2.1 inches deep, and 5.3 inches high. Bose has engineered the speaker with dual-opposing passive radiators and two high-efficiency transducers to deliver powerful, full-range sound, including impressive bass performance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bose-s-bluetooth-speakers-and-headphones-simplify-the-process-of-making-connections/

item.title: The World Health Organization recommends restricting the use of personal audio devices to less than one hour per day
item.description:
Source: WHO. The World Health Organization (WHO) cautions that over a billion adolescents and young adults risk noise-induced hearing loss. This danger stems from unsafe listening practices with personal audio devices like smartphones and exposure to high sound levels at entertainment venues, including sporting events. WHO analysis of data from developed and developing nations reveals that nearly half of teenagers and young adults aged 12-35 experience unsafe sound levels from personal audio devices...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-world-health-organization-recommends-restricting-the-use-of-personal-audio-devices-to-less-than-one-hour-per-day/

item.title: HTC has launched the HTC Desire 826 dual sim, promising an exceptional mobile audio experience
item.description:
Source: HTC. The Blue Lagoon version. HTC is enhancing the mobile audio experience with its Desire 826 dual sim phone, featuring HTC BoomSound and Dolby Audio surround sound. This makes HTC the first smartphone manufacturer to integrate dual front-facing stereo speakers, a precisely adjusted sound profile, and Dolby’s decoding technology for a comprehensive multi-channel audio solution. This combination provides listeners with a level of audio depth and range not typically found in mobile devices...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-has-launched-the-htc-desire-826-dual-sim-promising-an-exceptional-mobile-audio-experience/
